text: Hi, we're currently looking for ember/ruby developers to join our growing team to help us with some new products that we have planned. Location is in Stratford. Ideally looking for perm people. Please DM me if interested or if you know of anyone who is looking.
<@U04AW7GPM>: awesome. Is there a tweet you’d like us to retweet?
<@U04AW7GPM>: also, do you think you and the team will make it to this month’s meetup?
